meanings.definition: To melt or cause to melt excessively.
meanings.sent1: The sun was so hot that it started overmelting the ice cream.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to overmelt the chocolate when you are baking.
meanings.sent3: The overmelting cheese on the pizza made it a gooey mess.
meanings.sent4: Her anger overmelted away when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The candle overmelting in the sun created a colorful puddle on the table.

meanings.definition: The act or process of melting too much.
meanings.sent1: The overmelting of the ice sculpture was a disaster at the party.
meanings.sent2: The overmelting of the snow caused flooding in the streets.
meanings.sent3: The overmelting of the chocolate in the microwave ruined the dessert.
meanings.sent4: The overmelting of the candle wax created a beautiful but messy centerpiece.
meanings.sent5: The overmelting of the plastic toy resulted in a melted mess on the floor.
